results.description: Benevento pick up their first ever Serie A away win as they stun AC Milan at the San Siro.
results.title: AC Milan 0-1 Benevento

results.description: Paulo Dybala scores a hat-trick as Juventus beat Serie A's bottom side Benevento to go seven points clear at the top overnight.
results.title: Benevento 2-4 Juventus

results.description: Fiorentina pay an emotional tribute to former captain Davide Astori as the Italian club play their first game since the 31-year-old's sudden death.
results.title: Davide Astori: Fiorentina pay emotional tribute to former captain

results.description: Napoli maintain their one point advantage at the top of Serie A with victory at bottom side Benevento.
results.title: Benevento 0-2 Napoli

results.description: Former Arsenal and Manchester City defender Bacary Sagna joins Italian side Benevento for the rest of the season.
results.shortTitle: Sagna joins Serie A strugglers Benevento
results.title: Bacary Sagna: Former Man City and Arsenal defender joins Benevento in Italy

results.description: Serie A bottom club Benevento, who had only one point from their first 18 games, make it two wins in a row by beating 10-man Sampdoria.
results.title: Benevento 3-2 Sampdoria

results.description: Serie A bottom side Benevento secure their first league win of the season at the 19th attempt, beating Chievo 1-0.
results.shortTitle: Benevento secure first Serie A win
results.title: Benevento secure first league win of Serie A season at 19th attempt

results.description: Keeper Alberto Brignoli's goal for struggling Benevento is arguably one of the first things people will remember about this season in Serie A, says European football writer James Horncastle.
results.shortTitle: Why a goal from a keeper has lit up Serie A
results.title: Benevento: Bottom of Serie A but now the most talked about team in Italy

thumbnail.altText: Goalkeeper Alberto Brignoli celebrates scoring a goal for Benevento

results.description: Benevento goalkeeper Alberto Brignoli scores an injury-time equaliser against AC Milan as they pick up their first Serie A point.
results.title: Serie A keeper scores late leveller

results.description: Benevento break Manchester United's record for the worst ever start in the top five European leagues after conceding in added time to Sassuolo.
results.title: Benevento 1-2 Sassuolo

results.description: Former Manchester United winger Nani scores as Lazio continue their impressive start to the Serie A season by hammering bottom side Benevento.
results.title: Benevento 1-5 Lazio

results.description: Adel Taarabt is one of two Genoa players sent off in injury time after Inter Milan score a late winner.
results.title: Inter Milan 1-0 Genoa
